page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT IN BREAN (1)
page.content: THIS PART OF THE COAST HAS AN INFLUX OF UP TO 7'000 VISITORS IN THE PEAK OF THE HOLIDAY SEASON STAYING AT HOLIDAY SITES.ALTHOUGH SOME SITES HAVE PLACES OF THEIR OWN FOR ENTERTAINMENT.MANY VISITORS ENJOY GOING LOCAL CLUBS AND PUBLIC HOUSES. ENTERTAINMENT IN BREAN IS VARIED ALTHOGH FIVE YEARS AGO THERE WASN'T A PUB BETWEEN THE BERROW TRIANGLE AND BREAN DOWN,ABOUT FOUR MILES,IN THE LAST FIVE YEARS FIVE PUBS HAVE BEEN LICENSED AND ARE NOW SERVING THE LOCALS AND HOLIDAY MAKERS. THE FIVE PUBS ARE THE FLAMINGO INN,BEACHCOMBER,SEAGULL INN,FARMERS TAVERN AND THE SANDPIPER.THE FARMERS TAVERN IS VERY GOOD FOR MEETING NEW FRIENDS AND SOCIALISING.IT IS SITUATED IN THE BREAN LEISURE CENTRE.THERE IS A BAR WHICH IS VERY WELL FURNISHED.
